name: Overboard (itch) (devAydren, F1nn27)
description:
Oh no, your ship is sinking and the only way to stay afloat is to throw your cargo overboard! But it's not that easy, there's a pesky squid putting your cargo back! How long can you survive before your boat sinks? 

(Made in 7 days for BTP Game Jam #3)

How to play:

Press left click or A on a controller to pickup/drop cargo

Press right click or B on a controller to throw cargo

Cannons are too heavy to pickup, walk into them to push them!

Watch out for the squid that will throw your cargo back! If you want to survive you'll have to be efficient!
